Introduction
This topic contains general information about sleep apnea and related disabilities, including
sleep apnea and sleep studies
evaluating sleep apnea
qualifying devices for sleep apnea treatment
required use of a breathing assistance device
processing claims for increase in sleep apnea
, and
considering upper airway resistance syndrome (UARS)
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
